description:
Vampire Diaries star Zach Roerig is seeking sole custody of his 2-year-old daughter, because the girl's mother is currently serving time in federal prison, TMZ reports.TMZ报道，《吸血鬼日记》影星Zach Roerig（Matt的扮演者）现在正在争取2岁女儿的抚养权，孩子的目前现在正在联邦监狱服刑。

Roerig, 28, who plays Matt Donovan on the CW's supernatural drama, had previously not made it public knowledge that he was a father. But according to court documents obtained by TMZ, he had a daughter in 2011 with a woman named Alanna Turner.28岁的Roerig在CW科幻剧《吸血鬼日记》中扮演Matt Donovan这个角色，之前他并没有告诉外界自己已经有孩子了。但是根据TMZ拿到的法庭档案来看，他在2011年和一个名叫Alanna Turner的女子生了一个女儿。

In seeking full custody, Roerig claims Turner has been arrested at least three times.为了争取监护权，Roerig声称孩子的母亲Turner至少入狱过3次。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》Matt扮演者已有女儿 孩子母亲至少入狱3次
